src/tools/.description: All 11 server files (modelServer.ts, debugServer.ts, decideServer.ts, councilServer.ts, debateServer.ts, traceServer.ts, reflectServer.ts, hypothesisServer.ts, mapServer.ts, patternServer.ts, paradigmServer.ts) use manual validateXData() methods with if-statements for type checking. These should be replaced with Zod schemas.

src/models/interfaces.ts.description: Contains all TypeScript interfaces that Zod schemas must match: ThoughtData, MentalModelData, DesignPatternData, ProgrammingParadigmData, DebuggingApproachData, PersonaData, ContributionData, DisagreementData, CollaborativeReasoningData, OptionData, CriterionData, OutcomeData, DecisionFrameworkData, EisenhowerClassification, CostBenefitAnalysis, RiskItem, ReversibilityData, RegretMinimizationData, KnowledgeAssessment, ClaimAssessment, ReasoningAssessment, MetacognitiveMonitoringData, Variable, HypothesisData, Prediction, ExperimentData, ScientificInquiryData, ArgumentData, VisualElement, VisualOperationData.
